summary:
Comedian Pat O'Rourke discussed his lifelong friendship with Brian Kilmeade, how stand-up comedy has become more politically correct in recent years, growing up with the famous Baldwin family and helping warm up the crowds at Brian's Fox Nation series America: Great from the Start.

Here's your chance:Saturday, January 25, 2020 The Space at Westbury Theater 250 Post Ave Westbury, NY 11590click here to order ticketsClick here to find out where you can meet Brian on his book tour for "Sam Houston & The Alamo Avengers: The Texas Victory That Changed American History"

title: Pat O’Rourke On Growing Up With The Kilmeade & Baldwin Families on Long Island
